item.description:
Not sure what time this is taking place. Who wants to give me a hand asking some questions and filming our "elected" officials?

U.S. Sen. John Kerry is throwing himself a party at Symphony Hall.

The Dec. 13 fund-raiser is billed as a celebration of the senior senatorâ€™s 25 years in the U.S. Senate and 45 years of public service.

Conductor Keith Lockhart leads the Boston Pops during the performance, which will feature appearances by James Taylor, Noel Paul Stookey and Peter Yarrow of Peter, Paul, and Mary. Ben Affleck is among the VIP attendees.

Ticket prices range from $75 to $4,800 per person with donors of $1,000 or more getting an invitation to a pre-event reception and floor seats....

http://bostonherald.c...

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 12/13 Crash John Kerry's party.
